```{r}
inputPanel(
  # bin widget:
  radioButtons("n_bins_1", label = "Number of histogram bins:",
              choices = seq(50,125,by=25), selected = 75),
  # bandwidth widget:
  sliderInput("bw_adjust_1", label = "Density smoother bandwidth adjustment:",
              min = 0.1, max = 2, value = 1, step = 0.1),
  # data widget: selecting the variable 
  selectInput("x_1", label = "Type of ", 
             choices = c("Character count" ="charCount",
                         "Number of words" = "nWords",
                         "Number of real words" = "nRealWords"))
)
renderPlot({
  ggplot(tweets, aes_string(x = input$x_1)) + 
    geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), bins = input$n_bins_1) +
    geom_density(color = "blue", adjust = input$bw_adjust_1, size=1.5)
})
```
